localizedResources.title: Format document on Save
localizedResources.description:
Enables auto formatting of the code when you save a file. Visual Studio supports auto formatting of the code with the CTRL+E,D or CTRL+E,F key shortcuts but with this extension the VS command 'Format Document' is executed on Save.

You can find the source here: https://github.com/Elders/VSE-FormatDocumentOnSave
